title: Currently, what technologies could be easily hacked? - Quora

response.answer_text: Currently general purpose systems such as your daily use devices are the easiest to hack and most commonly hacked because many people use them. The second most easiest to hack and highest in number is Web Applications. Easily Hack able Techs Now Network Cameras: They are simply abundant and not secure. Many people configure it with default credentials which makes them easy to be hacked. You can find new network cameras using the http://Shadan.io . Get the API key through login and then you can use it on Linux using shodan terminal script. After that you can start brute forcing each IP on shadan search. Making a simple bash or python script will come handy.Operating Systems: By far the best things to be hacked because so much can be done. Data can be seen, pictures and videos can be taken, files can be opened, other malware can be downloaded on victims systems etc.. Metasploit is the tool to go for because it is easy to use and has a big database of exploits with usage.Web Applications: You may have heard about the news saying ‘something got hacked’ or seen defaced pages. They all are web application attacks. Many are there.. SQL Injections, XSS, CSRF, LFI, RFI etc.. There is a lot to learn here and the results are very instant if you’re able to exploit something. There are also many interrelated ‘tricks’ you can do to ‘expose’ a new vulnerability and exploit it.
